creator: RitoKids
descriptionHtml:
Rito Kids is the app that helps kids learn handwriting easier!


The application was created following numerous discussions and test sessions with teachers, parents and children in order to create a solution that best suits the needs of the little ones.


The main functionalities of the application are:
- real-time handwriting verification
- interactive learning exercises
- enjoyable and motivating user experience
- statistics for monitoring progress








Through real-time feedback, children instantly learn what they did wrong and how they can improve the next attempt. From our discussions we learned that sometimes children involuntarily learn certain wrong writing movements and it takes a lot of effort for them, the parents and the teachers to unlearn those already created habits. Through a much faster correction, the child manages to learn directly, without the effort of unlearning and relearning.




All letters of the alphabet (lowercase and uppercase) make up a learning map. Each letter is taught through a series of exercises starting with the graphic elements of the letter's composition, animations that highlight the stages of writing a letter, writing on the outline, writing on points and finally practicing letters starting only from the initial point.




Children take part in a learning adventure with Rito the Penguin. Rito is with children every step of the way with audio encouragement, star rewards and visual suggestions to improve their writing. The stars obtained from the completed exercises can be used to customize the penguin with various costumes and hats. Stars can only be earned through practice and cannot be purchased separately. In addition to the stars obtained from the exercises, for each fully learned letter (lower + uppercase), children are rewarded with a drawing model containing the learned letter. Children can relax by connecting the dots and coloring the resulting drawing.




Parents and teachers can check the child's progress in a dedicated section that contains statistics such as: the average number of exercises done in a day, the average number of minutes spent in the application, the letters already learned, the most difficult letter and the most beautiful letter.




Every day, the app is available for free for 15 minutes. For full access, it is necessary to purchase a 1-month or 3-month package.
The application is available for mobile phones and tablets. Best results are achieved when used with a pen or stylus to closely resemble the classic way of writing.


Good luck writing!
descriptionShort: Learning how to write can be fun and interactive!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Rito is here with improvements for the parents.

title:
Rito Kids: learn to write
1.4.12

container.value: B-dul 1 Decembrie 1918, Nr. 126, Bl. E, Sc. 1, Ap. 1, Cluj-Napoca, Cluj, Romania

creator: RitoKids
descriptionHtml:
Rito Kids turns the challenge of learning handwriting into an enjoyable adventure for children.

🏆 Winner of the "Best Education App" in the Microsoft Imagine Cup competition (2022), Rito Kids offers interactive handwriting exercises perfectly adapted to the needs of the little ones.

🌟 THE MAIN FEATURES of the app are:
✅ Real-time handwriting check
🎓 Interactive learning exercises
😄 Enjoyable and motivating user experience
📊 Statistics to monitor progress

📝 REAL-TIME FEEDBACK
With real-time feedback, children immediately understand what they did wrong and how they can improve on their next writing attempt. 💡 From our discussions we have learned that children often unintentionally form incorrect writing habits and it takes a lot of effort from them, parents and teachers to relearn the correct moves. Rito Kids provides children with feedback after each exercise to facilitate correct learning from the start and eliminate the effort of relearning.

🌟 EXERCISE STRUCTURE
The app is presented in an engaging way for young schoolchildren, in the form of a map containing all the letters of the alphabet, small and capital.
Each letter is learnt through a structured series of exercises, starting with the graphic elements of the letter's composition, continuing with animations that clarify the process of writing, tracing on the outline, tracing on dots and finally free writing from a starting point.

🎁 REWARDS AND GAMES
Children are accompanied on their writing learning adventure by the cute penguin Rito. 🐧 Rito is with the children every step of the way with audio encouragement, rewards, and visual suggestions to improve handwriting. The stars earned from completed exercises can be used to personalise the penguin with different costumes and hats. To ensure an authentic learning experience, stars can only be earned after practice, and cannot be purchased. In addition, for each letter learned (small + capital), children are rewarded with a drawing template containing the specific letter. Children can relax by connecting the dots and colouring in the resulting drawing. 🎨

👪 PARENTS' SPACE
Parents and teachers can check their children's progress in a dedicated section containing statistics such as: average number of exercises completed in a day, average minutes spent in the app, letters already learnt, most difficult letter and most beautiful letter.

📅 SUBSCRIPTIONS
Every day, the app is available for free for 10 minutes. For full access you need to purchase a 1 month, 3 months, or an unlimited subscription.

The app is available on mobile phones and tablets.
Best results are achieved when used with a touchscreen pen to resemble as closely as possible the classic way of writing. ✍️

CONTACT
The Rito Kids team is open to suggestions and questions at contact@ritokids.com or on the website https://www.ritokids.com/

🍀 Good luck with your writing!
descriptionShort: The award-winning app teaching children handwriting through letter tracing

appDetails.developerAddress: B-dul 1 Decembrie 1918, Nr. 126, Bl. E, Sc. 1, Ap. 1, Cluj-Napoca, Cluj, Romania
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: With each new release, we integrate user suggestions to improve the app experience.
